programme.title: Evening the Odds
programme.desc: Evening the Odds is a documentary on gender equity in sport, with a specific look at the situation within para sport in Canada. We talk with researchers to learn what needs to be done to make sport a level playing field for all genders.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP12) After a dying man confesses a murder in what appears to be an open and shut case, Murdoch finds a body but suspects the real killer might still be alive.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace)

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Depictions of the sex lives of people with disabilities are almost non-existent in pop culture. Rachele asks why, and sets out on a mission to change it.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP01) Emilee is done with her girl-next-door look. But as someone who is partially sighted, she's unsure about navigating fashion and beauty on her own. She wants tips, tricks and hacks on how to put together a professional, polished look independently.
Année : 2022

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP05) Elizabeth returns to Hope Valley and immediately volunteers to look after a neighbour's rural homestead. Abigail helps Clara settle in to life in Hope Valley.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Heart to Heart
programme.desc:
Who doesn't love a good love story? Heart to Heart tells the tales of three couples with something in common: one of the partners has a disability.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP11) Chef Michael Hunter joins Christine and Carl in the kitchen to talk all things braised and glazed.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
(S06EP01) We'll speak with authors, publishers, writing associations, kids and parents to find out why children with disabilities aren't being properly represented in children's literature in Canada, and what is being done to change it.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP10) In an effort to boost the workshop's organization, Chris and Alex build an entryway storage unit and a rolling tool cart.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP10) A high stakes card game involving Dr. Grace ends with the death of a player in the party. Murdoch is shocked to learn the true cost of their wagers is the opportunity to die.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Victor A. Young (Magnus MacDonald) Kate Ross (Fanny Glover) Evert Houston (Jacob Oliver) Jamie Robinson (Ned Watts)

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP34) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we're joined by Celine Lee from Amazon to discuss the company's groundbreaking collaboration with Cochlear to enhance the TV viewing experience for people with hearing implants.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:
(S01EP01) This episode of Disrupt spotlights the talent and creativity of a musician, a poet, a comedian, a filmmaker and a choir of performers who are Deaf.
Année : 2023

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP06) Elizabeth doubts her feelings for Jack when a visitor from her hometown comes to Hope Valley. Abigail is unsure how to assist her daughter-in-law. Bill probes further into an undercover investigation.

programme.desc:

programme.desc:
